sentences.en: Again the priests and rulers proceeded to lay plans for arresting Jesus.
sentences.cn: 祭司和官长们再次策划,要捉拿耶稣.

sentences.en: An arresting officer must advise the person being arrested.
sentences.cn: 实施逮捕的警察必须向被逮捕人发出警告.

sentences.en: Besides, this article also gives suggestions on arresting time - charted ships.
sentences.cn: 此外,对于期租船的扣押问题, 笔者也提出了个人的意见和相应对策.

sentences.en: But it was an arresting face, pointed of chin, square of jaw.
sentences.cn: 但那是一张十分迷人的脸, 尖尖的下巴, 方方的牙床.

sentences.en: Police are constantly arresting people over in the adult business district.
sentences.cn: 警察常在红灯区拘捕人犯.

sentences.en: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
sentences.cn: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

sentences.en: The mountains are the most arresting feature of the glen.
sentences.cn: 连绵的群山是大峡谷最明显的特征. 对么?

sentences.en: The police blundered badly by arresting the wrong man.
sentences.cn: 警方抓错了人,犯了荒唐的大错.

sentences.en: The police officers were arresting people for no reason.
The tone of his voice is so arresting that everyone listened attentively.
sentences.cn: 他的语调十分引人注意，大家都聚精会神地听着。

sentences.en: There was evidently some object which was arresting the passengers and forming them into a knot.
sentences.cn: 显然有什么东西吸引住了过路的人,使他们在那里围成了一团.

sentences.en: We should keep cracking down on criminals, arresting them whenever they surface.
sentences.cn: 还要不断地打击, 冒出一批抓一批.

sentences.en: Will you become rich and famous in the South for arresting me?
sentences.cn: 在韩国你会因为逮住了我而升官发财?

sentences.en: Wouldn't my tax dollars be better spent arresting drug dealers or bangers?
sentences.cn: 我纳的税款怎么不用来抓那些卖毒品和混混?

sentences.en: You're not arresting me because I screwed up my translation?
sentences.cn: 总不会因为我翻译得不好,你就把我抓起来 吧 ?

words.tran_cn: [电] 避雷器；[机] 制动器；防止装置；逮捕者

trans.tran_cn: 逮捕( arrest的现在分词 )，拘捕，制止，阻止
